sentences.sentence: The banns of their marriage were put up outside the registry office.
sentences.translation: 他们的婚事在结婚登记处外宣布了。

sentences.sentence: The minister has just published the banns of marriage at the church.
sentences.translation: 牧师刚刚在教堂宣布了结婚公告。

sentences.sentence: The banns were published in the local papers and a reception was given to the friends of the family.
sentences.translation: 当地的报纸都登载了结婚预告，还为女方家的朋友们举行了招待会。
